Package com.github.tommyettinger.spritz

Class SpriteBatch

java.lang.Object
com.github.tommyettinger.spritz.SpriteBatch
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Batch, com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Disposable
public class SpriteBatch extends Object implements com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Batch
Draws batched quads using indices. This is a drop-in replacement for SpriteBatch in libGDX, with some small fixes. It also makes every field and method at least as available as protected, and often public, but never private or "package-private". This last change is to ease subclassing, and to try to avoid needless copying of SpriteBatch code, all 800+ lines of source code it has.
See Also:
  • Batch

    • color

      public final com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Color color
      The current batch color. The default shader uses this to tint rendered colors in a multiplicative way. Custom shaders can use it for whatever they want.

    • colorPacked

      public float colorPacked
      The current "packed float color" form of color; this is what actually goes into the vertices.

      public int renderCalls
      Number of render calls since the last begin().

      Number of rendering calls, ever. Will not be reset unless set manually.

      The maximum number of sprites rendered in one batch so far.

    • SpriteBatch

      See Also:

    • SpriteBatch

      public SpriteBatch(int size)
      Constructs a SpriteBatch with one buffer and the default shader.
      See Also:
      • SpriteBatch(int, ShaderProgram)

    • SpriteBatch

      public SpriteBatch(int size, com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.glutils.ShaderProgram defaultShader)
      Constructs a new SpriteBatch. Sets the projection matrix to an orthographic projection with y-axis point upwards, x-axis point to the right and the origin being in the bottom left corner of the screen. The projection will be pixel perfect with respect to the current screen resolution.

      The defaultShader specifies the shader to use. Note that the names for uniforms for this default shader are different from the ones expect for shaders set with setShader(ShaderProgram). See createDefaultShader().

      Parameters:
      size - The max number of sprites in a single batch. Max of 8191.
      defaultShader - The default shader to use. This is not owned by the SpriteBatch and must be disposed separately.
